ColorfulBrains
Task Tracking Group Task Tracing Task Type Definition
You will be able to see the tasks assigned to you and receive notifications for unfinished tasks. You will be able to create groups for task assignments and make reminders for your group friends. You will be able to determine the type of tasks you assign, and thus you will be able to follow them easily.

Awful Level Bad Level Normal Level Good Level Super Level Mega Level
You got a very bad score from this game. We realize that the questions are not very easy, but you should improve yourself a little. You got a bad score from this game. But we believe it will be :) Stay tuned, we have a lot of questions to ask :) You have stayed at the normal level in this game, but do not worry… The progress is very good, we hope that we will see you at a mega level one day :) You made a good game, congratulations :) You are on a fast rise. We hope this stability does not deteriorate and we will see you at a mega level in the next games :) A super game, congratulations. You are far above average. We could not give you a gift in this game, but you are very close :) We hope you will be one of the winners in our next games. You must be a genius. You have fascinated us with your intelligence. Serious research needs to be done on your brain :)
